import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import './data.css' const Data = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { getData() }, []) async function getData() { const data = await fetch("http://localhost:3001/getUser", { method: "get", headers: { "Context-Text": "application/json" } }) const json = await data.json() if (json.status) { setData(json.data) } } if (data.length === 0) return null return (
Updating...
{ data.map((user) => (
  • Account Number -- {user.AccountNumber}
  • CustomerId -- {user.CustomerId}
  • MobileNumber -- {user.MobileNumber}
  • DOB -- {user.DOB}
)) }
) } export default Data
